name: ASTERS LAW FIRM ATTORNEYS' PARTNERSHIP
goal:
Implementation of the Association Agreement requires follow up with the law makers in Ukraine and in the EU to be able to inform our clients on the developments in this field.
The main goals are:
- fill in the Public Consultation Forms based on the firm's own expertise and experience
- visit the events related to the implementation of the Association Agreement

Asters Law Firm does not represent its clients to the European Commission / Parliament. Its own Cyberdesk is active beyond borders, therefore we would like to fill the public consultation forms in the field of cybersecurity.
interests: Competition, Digital economy and society, Energy, Enlargement, Trade
euInitiatives: Asters monitors EU initiatives, policies and legislative files in a number of areas, including financial regulation, corporate law, competition, intellectual property, TMT & cybersecurity
